thread.title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend: 'We are pregnant'
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend: 'We are pregnant' - CNN.com

author: Ralph Ellis, CNN
title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend: 'We are pregnant'
text:
Story highlights Chrissy Teigen went on Instagram Monday to announce, "We are pregnant" The model had talked about how she and husband John Legend had struggled to have a baby (CNN) Supermodel Chrissy Teigen and singer John Legend are expecting a baby.
Just a few months after going on television to talk about their fertility struggles, Teigen took to Intstagram Monday to tell the world that a child is on the way.
"John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant :)
"As many of you know, we've been trying to have a baby for a while now. It hasn't been easy, but we kept trying because we can't wait to bring our first child into the world and grow our family.
"We're so excited that it's finally happening. Thank you for all your love and well wishes. I look forward to all the belly touching! Xx"
John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant :) As many of you know, we've been trying to have a baby for a while now. It hasn't been easy, but we kept trying because we can't wait to bring our first child into the world and grow our family. We're so excited that it's finally happening. Thank you for all your love and well wishes. I look forward to all the belly touching! Xx
A photo posted by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Oct 12, 2015 at 4:55pm PDT
Read More Teigen said on the Tyra Banks television show "FabLife" not long ago that people often asked when she and her husband of two years were starting a family, unaware that she and Legend were having trouble getting pregnant.
"We would have had kids five, six years ago if it had happened," she said. "It's been a process. We've seen fertility doctors."
